tools.name: Doctor
tools.description: Checks OS/RAM/disk, Bepoz registry, and local SQL connectivity.

tools.name: Printer Fallback Audit
tools.description: Audits printer fallback settings for a selected VenueID and reports anomalies; optional safe Apply Fix can clear invalid/self fallback IDs with explicit GUI confirmation.

tools.name: Create POS Terminals
tools.description: Creates POS terminals by cloning a template Workstation into a selected Venue and Store (dry-run by default, with explicit confirmation).

tools.name: Create Store + Assign to Venue
tools.description: Creates a new dbo.Store and assigns it to a dbo.Venue (Store.VenueID). Safe by default (DryRun). Writes Report.json to RunDir.

tools.name: Venue Check
tools.description: Read-only check: lists venues in dbo.Venue, basic sanity checks, exports CSV + Report.json.

tools.name: Venue Cardnames Propagate
tools.description: Closes running Bepoz apps under C:\Bepoz\Programs, copies cardname_1..cardname_16 from a master VenueID to all other venues, then reopens the apps. Safe-by-default audit mode.
